title: drunk passenger:Watch: Drunk Man Was Restrained With Plastic Wrap By Co-Passengers For Trying To Open Emergency Door Mid-Flight
text:
Drinking makes most people rowdy. Some still chose to do it in public spaces, create a mess for themselves and endanger the lives of others. Cases of drunk people doing crazy shit at airports and in airplanes are becoming increasingly common.

A drunk man went bonkers on a flight from Russia to Thailand, and that’s when his co passengers decided to take matters into their hands.

Reportedly, the drunk dude tried to open the emergency door of the airplane, mid-flight, thus threatening the lives of his co-passengers. However he was stopped from doing so by people around him who restrained him in a plastic wrap.

Incidentally, Elena Demidova, a TV reporter was on board that flight and recorded the incident.





In a video that is going viral she can be heard saying,"Suddenly the sign 'fasten your seat belts' began to flash. Why? Minutes later the captain explained a passenger in the rear of the plane was drunk and rowdy. A doctor tried to calm him. Then tougher measures were taken. They tried to use plastic food wrap to tie him. Seven people were holding him, but nothing helped.”

Reportedly, it took seven cabin crew members and many passengers to restrain the drunk man and an emergency landing had to be made in Uzbekistan because of the commotion.

The drunk man was also accused of abusing a female cabin crew member and was later arrested. The drama on the flight didn’t end there. Reportedly a fight broke out between two other drunk passengers and one person was caught smoking in the toilet.

Well, one should only drink as much can be handled, otherwise things might become way more interesting than required.
